Title: Provides a non-revenue E-ZPass to every sworn officer of the metropolitan transportation police department
Summary: Provides a non-revenue E-ZPass to every sworn officer of the metropolitan transportation police department; provides for the disposal of such E-ZPass after a police officer leaves the metropolitan transportation authority.
LawCode: Add ยง1270-k, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing reimbursements to sworn officers of the metropolitan transportation authority police department non-revenue E-ZPasses
